Button.TooltipReference: Click to take back all of your starting stat choices
Click to place as many points as possible into Strength
Click to place as many points as possible into Stamina
Click to place as many points as possible into Agility
Click to place as many points as possible into Dexterity
Click to place as many points as possible into Wisdom
Click to place as many points as possible into Intelligence
Click to place as many points as possible into Charisma
Click to have a random name chosen for you
Click to choose your character's appearance
